long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Helper is a powerful extension for web browsers that offers additional features and functionality to the Tabroom website. This extension is not affiliated with Tabroom.com in any way and is not supported by them.

One of the standout features of Tab Helper is its ability to provide detailed judge statistics. This feature enables debaters to gain valuable insights into their judges' preferences and track their history with different categories. You'll be able to see how many rounds they've judged of each category, the number of tournaments they've judged, and even the percentage of aff and neg votes they've given. With this information, debaters can tailor their arguments to better suit each judge and increase their chances of success.

Additionally, Tab Helper makes important information such as the judge's email easily accessible on the side bar. This feature saves time and effort as debaters no longer have to search for the information they need.

Tab Helper also includes a new tab in judges paradigms that allows debaters to write notes about their judges' preferences and general experiences with them. This feature is especially helpful for debaters who want to refer back to their notes in future rounds with the same judge and adjust their arguments accordingly.

Tab Helper is an extension that provides debaters with valuable information and features to enhance their Tabroom experience. It is a must-have for any serious debater looking to gain an edge in debate tournaments.Introducing Tab Helper - the ultimate tool for any debater looking to gain an edge in their next debate tournament. 

Functionality:
- Judge Statistics (# of Tournaments/Rounds, Aff Votes, Neg Votes, Experience)
- Judge Info (Email)
- Judge Notes (Save notes about judges for future rounds)
- Lifetime Statistics on Student Records
